content: वसतिः --ती {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [वस्-अति वा ङीप्] {@--1@} Dwelling, residing, abiding; आश्रमेषु वसतिं चक्रे <ls>Me. 1</ls> ‘fixed his residence in’; <ls>Ś. 5. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A house, dwelling, residence, habitation; हर्षो हर्षो हृदयवसतिः पंचबाणस्तु बाणः <ls>P. R. 1. 22</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 14.</ls> {@--3@} A receptacle, reservoir, an abode (<ab>fig.</ab>); अलकामतिवाह्यैव वसतिं वसुसंपदां <ls>Ku. 6. 37</ls>; so विनयवसतिः, धर्मैकवसतिः. {@--4@} A camp, halting place (शिबिर). {@--5@} The time when one halts or stays to rest, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} night; तस्य मार्गवशादेका बभूव वसतिर्यतः <ls>R. 15. 11</ls> (वसतिः = रात्रिः <ls>Malli.</ls>) ‘he halted at night’ &c.; तिस्रो वसतीरुषित्वा <ls n="Malli.">7. 33</ls>; <ls n="Malli.">11. 30</ls>. {@--6@} A Jaina monastery.
